mapper.update: UPDATE train_equipment SET name = #{name}, bazaar_id = #{bazaarId}, label_id = #{labelId}, shop_id = #{shopId}, remarks = #{remarks}, office_id = #{bazaarId} WHERE id = #{equipmentId}
mapper.select:
